inclusion.criterion: Locally advanced or metastatic, histologically proven clear cell or papillary cell renal carcinoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least four weeks from any previous therapy for renal cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fit for first or second line immunotherapy with subcutaneous low dose IL-2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Free of clinically apparent autoimmune disease.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Haemoglobin ≥ 9 g/dL, total white cell count ≥ 3 x 10^9/L and lymphocyte count ≥ 1 x 10^9/dL
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous immunotherapy with any schedule of IL-2.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Intercurrent serious infections within the 28 days prior to entry into the trial.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has a history of prostate volume (TRUS): 60 mL and Prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level: 3.2 ng/mL.
